nodes.text: The Orkoon Hub was a location on the planet Jakku. When Grand Admiral Rae Sloane traveled to Jakku to find out information about Gallius Rax she came across Ergel's Bar in Cratertown where the bartender, Corwin Ballast, told Sloane that a Knockback Nectar was ten credits apiece or one quarter-portion from the Orkoon hub.
